creator: renaud.richardet@wyona.com
text:
in /lenya-1.4.x_trunk/src/modules/xhtml/resources/schemas/xhtml.rng, changing

<include
href="fallback://lenya/modules/xhtml/resources/schemas/xhtml/xhtml-basic.rng">

to
<include 
href="fallback://lenya/modules/xhtml/resources/schemas/xhtml/xhtml.rng">

will result in the error:
BaseURI is not valid, it must contain a protocol: modules/frames.rng

From the logs:
Resolving 
'file:/home/..../lenya-1.4.x_trunk/modules/basic-table.rng' 
with base 
'modules/table.rng' 
in context 
'file:/home/..../lenya-1.4.x_trunk/build/lenya/webapp/'

Created attachment 18777
unified diff against /src/modules/xhtml

this patch should fix transitional and strict
creator: renaud.richardet@wyona.com

text:
one last note:
IIUC , the cause of the error is that e.g. forms.rng has an <include
href="basic-form.rng"> that cannot be resolved.
creator: renaud.richardet@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 18778
unified diff against /src/modules/xhtml

missing resources/schemas/xhtml/xhtml.rng
